Text:
Not sure but my previous comments might has been lost on the other torrent.

Why I was suggesting label them 'podcast' is because others do (mark levin show) and that both of my mp3 players don't resume playback after shutting down unless they are labeled in genre as 'podcast' or 'audio book'.
......the mark levin show comes from him...his site...i don't record it live.....his staff codes it
Yup.  That is why I used it as an example.  I just thought others might not really know about resume play on most players unless they are labeled correctly.
